note: This data aims to provide estimates that are comparable over time within individual countries. A [separate dataset](https://ourworldindata.org/grapher/intensity-of-multidimensional-poverty-national) provides more complete data of the latest estimates for international comparisons.
title: Intensity of multidimensional poverty
subtitle: Multidimensional poverty is defined as being deprived in a range of health, education and living standards indicators. The intensity is the share of indicators in which people in multidimensional poverty are deprived on average.
